SELECT r.create_time, u.user_name, u.user_info_id, u.user_phone FROM ptp_in_report AS ir INNER JOIN ptp_report AS r ON r.trip_code = ir.trip_code INNER JOIN ptp_user_info AS u ON u.user_info_id = r.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND r.create_time >= date_format( #{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )
AND r.create_time >= date_format( #{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )
AND (u.user_name LIKE concat('%',#{condition},'%') OR u.user_phone LIKE concat('%',#{condition},'%'))
AND ir.device_id =#{deviceId}

SELECT ( SELECT device_addrese FROM ptp_device WHERE edit_device_id = r.get_device_id ) AS get_device_addrese, ( SELECT device_addrese FROM ptp_device WHERE edit_device_id = r.out_device_id ) AS out_device_addrese, r.repair_get, r.report_type, r.repair_line, r.repair_out, r.get_report_time, r.out_report_time, r.user_id, r.user_phone, r.state, r.trip_code FROM ptp_report AS r WHERE 1=1 AND r.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY r.get_report_time DESC
SELECT ( SELECT device_addrese FROM ptp_device WHERE edit_device_id = ir.device_id ) AS in_device_addrese, ir.create_time FROM ptp_in_report AS ir WHERE ir.trip_code = #{tripCode}
